scripts.build-all: pnpm run -C packages/browser build && pnpm run -C packages/env build && pnpm run -C packages/optimize build && pnpm run -C packages/type build && pnpm run -C packages/utils build
scripts.publish-all: pnpm run -C packages/browser publishToNpm && pnpm run -C packages/env publishToNpm && pnpm run -C packages/optimize publishToNpm && pnpm run -C packages/type publishToNpm && pnpm run -C packages/utils publishToNpm
